search.query: $source_token$ eth_dst=$filteredMAC$ src_is_private_ip="false" | fields ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, _* | table ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn

| search [| loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | where NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src) | dedup eth_src | table eth_src] | where ip_src!="" AND NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src) | fields ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, _* | table ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn
sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

| fillnull value="" | dedup ip_src | rename ip_src as ip, src_query_name as "DNS Query", src_fqdn as "Reverse Lookup" | join type=left ip [| loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as "bytes out" by ip_src | rename ip_src as ip ] | join type=left ip [| loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as "bytes in" by ip_dst | rename ip_dst as ip ] | join type=left ip [| loadjob $subsearch_id_external_endpoints$ | rename ip_src as ip | where tls_handshake_type=1 | eval client_hello=1 | table client_hello, ip ] | table ip, "DNS Query", "Reverse Lookup", "bytes out", "bytes in" | fillnull value=0
